text: The 1964–65 Marquette Warriors men's basketball team represented Marquette University during the 1964–65 men's college basketball season. It was Al McGuire's first season as head coach. ==Roster== ==Schedule== 2014-15 Marquette Golden Eagles men's basketball record book. Retrieved 2015-Jul-08. ==Statistics== *Tom Flynn 16.5 ppg *Paul Carbins 11.7 ppg ==References== Category:Marquette Golden Eagles men's basketball seasons Marq Marq Category:1964–65 NCAA University Division men's basketball independents season
title: 1964–65 Marquette Warriors men's basketball team
